body_html: Chainer solves this in a different way: each module can only occur once, in a single container, although you can invoke it many times. This might end up being much simpler and less error prone.
body_text: Chainer solves this in a different way: each module can only occur once, in a single container, although you can invoke it many times. This might end up being much simpler and less error prone.
